client-email.subject: LEA 4 International Contact confirmation
client-email.title: Thanks for your message
client-email.description: We confirm receipt of your details and then provide you with a summary of the information you have submitted to us.
client-email.working-on:
We are reviewing all information and will contact you soon for any additional clarification or to inform you of next steps.

We appreciate your interest and patience.

Best regards from the team,
LEA 4 International.
